title.rendered: Tastebudz Rainbow Belts Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🌈 Rainbow Belts Strain – Autoflowering Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Taste the Spectrum of Relaxation – In a Fast, Fruity Autoflower

The Rainbow Belts strain by Tastebudz Syndicate is now available in a fast-finishing autoflowering version — delivering all the sweet flavour and balanced potency of the original in just 75 days. Bred from Reefereshers (Do-Si-Dos x Sunset Zkittlez) and Forbidden Fruitz Auto, this mostly Indica hybrid is a flavour-packed experience made for speed, simplicity, and terp-chasers.

With 25% THC, dense frosty buds, and a unique flavour profile of berries, citrus, and cookies, this autoflowering Rainbow Belts strain is a top choice for collectors who want powerful results with minimal effort.

Looking for the original feminised version? Click here to view the photoperiod Rainbow Belts strain →

Note: All seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation is illegal in the UK without a government-issued licence.

📊 Rainbow Belts Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Reefereshers (Do-Si-Dos x Sunset Zkittlez) x Forbidden Fruitz Auto
Strain Type Mostly Indica Hybrid
Flowering Time 75 Days (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 500g/m² (info only)
THC Content Up to 25%
Flavours Sweet berries, sour citrus, cookie finish
Aromas Fruity, zesty, baked-sugar undertones
Effects Euphoric, calming, stress-relieving

🌟 Why Rainbow Belts Stands Out as an Autoflower

  • 25% THC Power – Heavy-hitting effects with a chill finish
  • Full-Spectrum Flavour – Bold notes of ripe berries, citrus, and a creamy cookie exhale
  • Fast Results – From seed to harvest in just 75 days
  • Beginner-Friendly – Compact and easy to manage, ideal for indoor grows
  • Based on a Tastebudz Favourite – Now in an autoflowering format for fast, repeatable results

Whether you’re after flavour, speed, or a relaxing evening smoke, the Rainbow Belts strain in autoflower form brings all three with no compromise.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Rainbow Belts Strain

1. What is the Rainbow Belts strain (auto version)?
It’s a potent, fruity autoflowering hybrid created by Tastebudz, bred from Reefereshers and Forbidden Fruitz Auto. This version offers a fast-growing, easy-to-collect version of the photoperiod classic.

2. What does the Rainbow Belts strain taste like?
Expect rich berry sweetness up front, followed by sour citrus tang and a smooth, cookie-like finish — it’s a dessert smoke from start to finish.

3. Is this Rainbow Belts autoflower good for beginners?
Yes! The autoflowering Rainbow Belts strain is resilient, quick, and requires no light cycle changes — perfect for collectors of all levels.

4. What are the effects of Rainbow Belts?
It starts with an uplifting buzz that melts into body-soothing calm — ideal for unwinding, lifting mood, and relieving tension.

5. How long does Rainbow Belts Auto take from seed to harvest?
Just 75 days, making it a fast-flowering, low-maintenance option for multiple seasonal grows or quick results.

🛒 Add the Rainbow Belts Strain to Your Collection

Whether you’re building out your auto collection or looking for a fruit-forward indica with serious punch, the Rainbow Belts strain in autoflower format checks every box. From flavour to potency to turnaround time — it’s a standout.

🎁 Free Cannabis Seeds in Every Order!

🚚 Free U.K Shipping over £50 With International Options Available

👑 Tastebudz Classic Strain

🌈 Why Tastebudz Rainbow Belts Strain Autoflower Seeds?

A mostly Indica strain with a potent 25% THC content. This remarkable strain combines the genetics of Reefereshers (Do-si-dos x Sunset Zkittlez) and Forbidden Fruitz Auto, offering a bountiful yield of up to 500g/m² in just 75 days from seed to harvest.

Expect an indulgent flavour profile with sweet berries, sour citrus, and a hint of cookies. The effects are powerfully euphoric, delivering deep physical relaxation – Rainbow belts seeds are perfect for unwinding after a long day. A true delight for both mind and body!
